author: Staff Reporter
text: The III-Additional District Judge (III-ADJ) of Coimbatore P. Karthikeyan on Tuesday convicted and sentenced K. Thangaraj (35) of Pannadipudur village near Sathyamangalam to three years rigorous imprisonment after he was found guilty of pushing down his father-in-law K. Karupasamy alias Periyakarupan (88), which claimed his life.
title: Man sentenced for murdering father-in-law
